system.sustained: The Psyker Shapes force into a blade, counts as a Sword in the hands of the Psyker, but with no penalty for lacking weapon training. To strike with it, make Weapon Skill Test, if hitting, does 1d10 + 3xPsy Rating Rending Damage, with Psy Rating Penetration. This weapon can be parried, but can not destroyed if parrying weapon has a power field. As it counts as Sword, it has Balanced Quality (+10 to Parry)
